txt_en: The only real failure is the failure to try and the measure of success is how we cope with disappointment.
txt_cn: 唯一真正的失败是放弃尝试；衡量成功的标准是我们如何面对失望。
author: 《涉外大饭店》

txt_en: The time spent with you allowed me to feel again.
txt_cn: 与你共度的时光，让我重新苏醒。
author: 《大洋之间的灯光》

txt_en: If you want the best the world has to offer, offer the world your best.
txt_cn: 若想得到世界上最好的东西，先向世界展现最好的你。
author: Neale Donald Walsch

txt_en: I like to feel his eyes on me when I look away.
txt_cn: 我喜欢当我看向别处时他的目光停留在我身上的感觉。
author: 《爱在黎明破晓前》

txt_en: You never know how far you can go unless you run.
txt_cn: 你如果不跑起来，就永远不知道自己能走多远。
author: 《一代骄马》

txt_en: A clear vision, backed by definite plans, gives you a tremendous feeling of confidence and personal power.
txt_cn: 一个清晰的愿景，加以明确计划的支持，会给你极大的信心和个人力量。
author: Brian Tracy

txt_en: They say when you meet the love of your life, time stops, and that's true.
txt_cn: 人们说当你遇上你的挚爱，时间会停止，事实的确如此。
author: 《大鱼》

txt_en: Everybody's got a job to do, and I do mine as best I can.
txt_cn: 每个人都有自己的事情要做，我会竭尽全力把属于自己的做好。
author: 玛丽·马特林

txt_en: Even if you're on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there.
txt_cn: 即便你刚好处于正轨，如果你只坐在那里的话，还是会被撞翻。
author: Will Rogers

txt_en: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
txt_cn: 要么你主宰生活，要么让生活主宰你。
author: Jim Rohn

txt_en: It's good to set limits for oneself, but there comes a moment when we must destroy what we have constructed.
txt_cn: 为自己设限是不错，不过有时候我们必须打破自己一手建立的一切。
author: Josef Koudelka

txt_en: The morning, which is the most memorable season of the day, is the awakening hour.
txt_cn: 在一天之中，清晨最值得怀恋和纪念，这是一段让万物醒悟的光阴。
author: 梭罗

txt_en: Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort.
txt_cn: 幸福来源于收获时的欢乐和创作时的激动。
author: 福兰克林·罗斯福

txt_en: Without deviation from the norm, progress is not possible.
txt_cn: 不偏离常规，就无法取得进步。
author: Frank Zappa

txt_en: Life is a sum of all your choices. So, what are you doing today?
txt_cn: 生活就是你所有选择的总和，那么，你今天要做什么？
author: Albert Camus

txt_en: Art doesn't have to do anything. It just has to be there for the fierce pleasure we take in doing it.
txt_cn: 艺术不需要做什么。在我们从事艺术时，能让人感受到强烈的愉悦就够了。
author: Raymond Carver

txt_en: Real generosity toward the future lies in giving all to the present.
txt_cn: 将一切奉献给当下，就是对未来的真正慷慨。
author: Albert Camus

txt_en: I am prepared for the worst, but hope for the best.
txt_cn: 我已做好最坏的打算，但仍期待最好的结果。
author: 班杰明‧迪斯雷利

txt_en: I believe every human has a finite number of heartbeats. I don't intend to waste any of mine.
txt_cn: 我相信每个人的心跳次数有限，所以我不想浪费任何一下。
author: 尼尔·阿姆斯特朗

txt_en: Most of us have far more courage than we ever dreamed we possessed.
txt_cn: 我们大部分人所拥有的勇气比我们梦想得到的要多得多。
author: 戴尔·卡内基
